TASK-171A.title: User Authentication System
TASK-171A.description: Implement JWT-based authentication with user registration, login, and profile management

TASK-171B.title: Agent Marketplace Backend
TASK-171B.description: Build backend APIs for agent marketplace with listing, install, and rating features

TASK-171C.title: Custom Agent Builder UI
TASK-171C.description: Create intuitive interface for users to build custom agents with prompts and configurations

TASK-171D.title: Production Error Handling
TASK-171D.description: Implement comprehensive error handling, logging, and recovery mechanisms for production

TASK-171E.title: Authentication UI Integration
TASK-171E.description: Create login/register pages and integrate authentication flow in frontend

TASK-171F.title: Integration Testing Suite
TASK-171F.description: Comprehensive E2E tests for auth flow, marketplace, and agent builder

sprint_goal: Transform MVP-Lite into production-ready system with user auth and agent marketplace
